ioswebappcapable_config_c1_enabled_desc: Select to enable the 'web-app-capable' functionality for this market. If enabled, it will cause websites which are being started from the home screen on an Apple iOS device to run in standalone mode, i.e. it hides the browser user interface.
sitemap_generateVideomap_desc: Whether to generate a video sitemap for this market.

int_basepath_desc: The base http location of CGI/MMG webservice, eg.cgi.chevrolet.com/mmgprod-us/dynres/prove/image.gen DO NOT include the protocol(http or https).

The image size is to assist authors in choosing the correct size. Please type in width and height as pixel, eg 960*540.
iperception_config_c1_enabled_desc: Select to enable the iPerception functionality for this market.
add_touch_and_tile_icons_apple_descripti: Image must have 152 x 152 pixels and must be a *.PNG file.
add_touch_and_tiles_config_edit_microsof: Used for home screen on Windows mobile devices
add_touch_and_tile_icons_microsoft_tile_: Background colors can be set up on the Company Template.

add_touch_and_tile_icons_android_label: Used for home screen on Android devices
add_touch_and_tile_icons_microsoft_label: Used for home screen on Windows mobile devices
add_touch_and_tile_icons_config_c1_title: Bookmark icons on Apple iOS, Android and Windows 8 home screens
add_touch_and_tile_icons_android_descrip: Image must have 196 x 196 pixels and must be a *.PNG file.
add_touch_and_tile_icons_apple_label: Used for home screen on iPhone and iPad
add_touch_and_tiles_config_edit_static_l: Add Apple app icons, Android app launcher icons and Microsoft tile icons for a better support of saving pages to home screen of respective devices. Markets are allowed to upload one global icon that will be applied to every bookmark saved on home screen. The icon‘s caption is always the page title.
app_enable_pref_desc: Enabling preferences will use local storage that enables the visualizer to retain preferences and configurations that will control the display of the visualizer is standard mode.
app_conf_vehicle_desc: Label to be displayed adjacent to the color chip. Use the variables [ModelYear] and [Carline] to insert contextual labels into the message.

navigation_style_desc: Standard Navigation Style displays default styling for Navigation.An enhanced or alternative navigation may be available for a brand. If so, selecting “Enhanced” will enable that functionality.
schema_markup_enabled_desc: Setting this property enables the schema.org markup in the selected templates and components for improved SEO. Once enabled, individual pages may be disabled in the page properties dialog.
glossary_config_1_glossary_layers_desc: Select the T14B Glossary template where the Glossary Items are maintained, that should be displayed in Glossary Layers on the site.

intelligent_page_switching_desc: Select if Build, Offers, and Inventory links on the N3 Template should automatically redirect to a page for the preferred vehicle.

config_ut_zip_c1_include_not_set_label: Only when cookie cannot be set
config_ut_zip_c1_error_message_desc: Please provide a general error message, e.g. "Please provide a valid postal code." The message will be displayed, when the field is empty or doesn’t match the provided pattern.
config_ut_zip_c1_input_field_desc: This label will be displayed as placeholder inside the input field.
config_ut_zip_c1_application_name_field_: Please input the shorthand name for the application. e.g. byo for Build Your Own, lad for Locate A Dealer, vco for View Current Offers.
config_ut_zip_c1_valid_pattern_desc: Enter the required pattern using # for any number (0-9) and a for any letter (A-Z). E.g. enter ##### if the postal code needs to consist of exactly five numbers or enter a#a#a# if a postal code like M4B 2Z1 is valid. Spaces and all characters other than numbers or letters entered by the user are ignored (M4B 2Z1 or M4B-2Z1 are validated as M4B2Z1). The validation is only available for seach by postal code.
config_ut_zip_c1_button_desc: Please provide a label for the submit button.
rss_folder_location_desc: Select the folder location for the RSS Feeds. This folder will determine where the RSS feeds will be available in the architecture of the site.
rss_description_desc: Enter a description for the RSS Feed.
rss_title_desc: Enter a title for the RSS Feed.
rss_copyright_desc: Sets copyright notice for the RSS feeds. (optional)
rss_categories_text: Select the categories that should be added to RSS Feed by default. Authors may choose to disable the feed in the individual article page properties (T13b). Removing the story category will not deselect existing articles from the RSS Feed.
blackbook_config_c1_enabled_desc: Enables the Black Book Tagging ScriptEdit
blackbook_config_c1_src_desc: When Black Book is activated, a 'Site Code' value is required.
fieldwidth_desc: Maximum width in pixels (px) of the input field. If no field width is set, will default to 100% width.
cnt_handraiser_config_c1_error_message_d: Add message to be displayed if error noted on form submission.
postalcityvalidation_desc: Enable USPS API validation for the Postal Code and City Fields. Only for use in the United States.
maxfieldinput_desc: Maximum # of characters that may be entered into the field.
symbols_spacing_desc: If checked, symbols and spacing will be stripped from the submitted data. This is useful for phone numbers and postal codes which may be entered in different formats by users.
validateFormat_desc: Tokens can be used to validate the format of the field. Use “#” for numbers and “A” for letters. For example, Canadian postal code would be “A#A#A#”. If “Symbols/Spacing” is checked, format validation will occur after stripping.
fieldtype_desc: Set the validation for the user input field. For example, if “Numeric” is selected, only numbers may be entered in this field on user input. Note that “Dropdown” requires Valid Input Options. Use the email type for “Email” and “Confirm Email” fields.
valid_input_options_desc: If the field can only take in certain inputs, for example state abbreviations, the options should be set above. Each newline (hard return) will be a new option. If there is a difference between the desired display of the item and the submitted data, the code value can be set in ><. For example, “Alabama >AL<” where “Alabama” would display, but “AL” would be submitted.
sharing_email_template_config_c1_enable_: AddThis Email Template, Edit Share Configuration
sharing_email_template_config_c1_select_: Please determine an AddThis profile to specify the desired e-mail template layout.
sharing_email_template_config_c1_complim: This is the complimentary closing which will be displayed below the shared URL.
sharing_email_template_config_c1_enable_: This will enable a master email template for AddThis. A custom master copy can be defined, which will be used by default when sharing a configuration via email.
sharing_email_template_config_c1_url_lab: The URL will be generated by AddThis, when user shares the configuration. You can define the labeling of the link.
sharing_email_template_config_c1_select_: Please select a desired template by entering respective template name. It will be valid for all markets within one brand.
jw_skin_desc: Please provide a name for the video player skin. This name will appear in   video dialogs for selection.

servicesettings_tab_description: The following providers/services use cookies. Please select for each one, which is used in this market, if it should only be included, when the user has consented to the use of cookies ("Consent Required") or if it can always be included ("Inclusion Always Allowed").

showlayerBtn_desc: If the Layer Button is set to be displayed only on selected pages, select this checkbox, if you want to display it on this page.

pagetitle_desc: The Meta Page Title is very important for SEO. Use it to briefly provide a summary of the page content, using brand and non-brand terms. Refer to best practice formula.
metadesc_desc: Use the description tag to provide more information about the page content and to encourage click through. Use words like "Learn more about..." or "Discover the..." with benefit-driven wording.
gmdsVanityPath_desc: You may specify a vanity path here, for example "/agila.html" or "/corvette/zr1.html" to simplify the URL. Please note that the vanity path has to be unique within the market and language (i.e. unique within all pages below the homepage).
secondlevelnav_desc: Choose "Inherited", if you want to use the same setting as the parent page. Choose "Title Navigation", if the title of the parent folder should be displayed as title for the navigation and choose "No Navigation", if you don't want to include a second level navigation at all.
sticky_footer_shopping_link_desc: Select the sticky footer shopping links that should be used on this page. The options are pulled from the LSLR page
mobileAlternateURL_desc: If the content on this page is available in a mobile/handheld optimized version under a different URL, please provide this URL here.
use_canada_contact_dealer_parameters_des: Use Canada Contact Dealer Parameters to add parameters to the url.
canonicalReference_desc: If you have duplicate or fall back pages with similar or identical content, insert a "canonical reference URL" here so the search engine only indexes one version of the page. Failure to do so can be penalised as duplicate content and result in lower search rankings.
navtitle_desc: Enter the name the page should have in the navigation.
testandtarget_enabled_desc: Select to include the global mbox on this page.
testandtarget_mboxjs_desc: If left empty, the default mbox.js file will be used.
testandtarget_mboxname_desc: If left empty, the automatically created name will be used.
darttagging_cat_desc: Please enter the value of the "cat" parameter.
floodlightdarttagging_type_desc: The group tag string, which identifies the activity group with which the Floodlight activity is associated in DFA Trafficking. (The activity group is used for reporting purposes).
floodlightdarttagging_u_desc: You can use this variable to pass to Floodlight any data that you want to use as criteria for reports. For more information regarding what these values are, please contact your media client lead. This is optional to use.
darttagging_type_desc: Please enter the value of the "type" parameter.
floodlightdarttagging_cat_desc: The activity tag string, which identified the Floodlight activity. You can set your own value for the activity tag string or use the default value. The default activity tag string is based on the first five letters of the activity name, plus a random three-digit string.
twitter_card_description_desc: A short description (maximum 200 characters) of the page which will be used for Twitter Cards. (twitter:description)
twitter_card_creator_id_desc: Twitter user ID of content creator (twitter:creator:id)
twitter_card_site_id_desc: Same as twitter:site, but the user's Twitter ID (twitter:site:id)
open_graph_description_desc: A short description of the page. It is used when sharing the page on Facebook, Google+ or by Email.
twitter_card_app_id_iphone_desc: App ID in the iTunes App Store (Note: NOT the bundle ID) (twitter:app:id:iphone)
twitter_card_app_url_iphone_desc: App's custom URL scheme (must include "://" after the scheme name) (twitter:app:url:iphone)
twitter_card_app_id_ipad_desc: App ID in the iTunes App Store (twitter:app:id:ipad)
twitter_card_label_2_desc: Customizable label or units for the information in twitter:data2 (best practice: use all caps) (twitter:label2)
open_graph_title_desc: The title is used, when sharing the page on Facebook, Google+ or by Email.
open_graph_image_desc: This image will be used when the page is shared on Facebook or Google+.
twitter_tweet_description_desc: A short description (maximum 140 characters) of the page, which will be used for Tweets. If left empty, the Facebook/Google+/Email Description will be used.
twitter_card_player_stream_desc: URL to raw video or audio stream (twitter:player:stream)
twitter_card_app_name_ipad_desc: Name of your iPad optimized app (twitter:app:name:ipad)
twitter_card_data_2_desc: Bottom customizable data field, can be a relatively short string (i.e., "Seattle, WA") (twitter:data2)
open_graph_type_desc: Type will typically be: article, product, or activity. It is used when sharing the page on Facebook and influences how the page is shared.
open_graph_caption_desc: Add a caption to populate the text underneath the 'Title' in the Facebook share dialog.
twitter_card_app_id_googleplay_desc: App ID in the Google Play Store (twitter:app:id:googleplay)
twitter_card_label_1_desc: Customizable label or units for the information in twitter:data1 (best practice: use all caps) (twitter:label1)
twitter_card_image_src_desc: URL of image to use in the card (twitter:image:src)
open_graph_fb_app_id_desc: Select the App ID to be used on this page. This App_ID affects Facebook Share,Send & Like. Facebook App IDs are set in the Company Template.
twitter_card_data_1_desc: Top customizable data field, can be a relatively short string (i.e., "$3.99") (twitter:data1)
twitter_card_site_desc: @username of website, configured in Social Media Pages and Accounts config in the company page (twitter:site).
omniture_sprop33_desc: Set a value for "Model | Site Section". This value will usually be set automatically, but can be explicitly defined here.
edxtab_enable_desc: Select this, if eDX tagging should be enabled on this page.
netminingtab_disable_desc: Select this, if Netmining should be disabled on this page.
celebrus_disable_desc: Select this, if Celebrus should be disabled on this page.
searchignitetab_disable_desc: Select this, if Search Ignite should be disabled on this page.
psyma_enable_desc: Check the box to embed the psyma script on this page.
disableResizeable_desc: Disabling the resize function may not be supported in all browsers.
minWidth_desc: Choose Custom if you want to set a minimum width for all full width / liquid width components used on this page.
notifications_desc: You can provide additional information about this page here. This information is only for authors and will not be displayed on the page.
offtime_desc: You can provide the time at which the published page will be deactivated.
ontime_desc: You can provide the date and time at which the published page will be activated.
customMinWidth_desc: Use the arrows -OR- provide a number to set the container minimum width in pixels. Please note that the minimum width overrides the maximum width if both are set and conflict.
internalredirect_desc: Can be used for folder or node redirects, fallback links or similar. For 301 redirects use the Redirect Template instead.
baseballcardCarlineLink_desc: Please select a Baseball Card Carline to show all bodystyles of that carline or select a Baseball Card Node page to show all bodystyles that are placed anywhere below that node. You can also select a Baseball Card Collection of the type Carline/Family or Bodystyle Groups.
skin_config_description: Additional skins can be uploaded on the company template
closed_captions_description: Select the closed captions style for this player. Styles can be set up on the Company Template.

bbc_bodystyle_hide_attr_desc: If selected, attributes will not be displayed for this vehicle on the N01, N02B baseball cards, T4A Family pages, or the T03c Help Me Choose templates.
bbc_bodystyle_carline_override_desc: Selecting this option will override the settings for the Carline Baseball Card Attributes set in the Carline page for this Bodystyle only.
bbc_bodystyle_display_attr_desc: This selection affects the display of this Bodystyle vehicle only. Inheriting carline attributes will inherit the attributes selected in the carline BBC. Custom attributes will activate the other tabs and allow for the creation of custom bodystyle sets of attributes. Suppress Attributes will prevent the display of attributes for this bodystyle on the N1B, N2B baseball cards, T4A Family pages, and the T3C Help Me Choose templates.
legal_price_suffix_ts_prefvehicle_1_desc: Define the legal suffix for the price to be shown in the Teaser Preferred Vehicle (ts_prefvehicle_1).

accessories_internal_link_desc: Target of the 'Accessories' internal link. The text of the link is maintained on the LSLR. The link points to the accessories page for this vehicle.
legal_price_suffix_vi4_desc: Define the legal suffix for the price to be shown on the T03b or T03c template
type_of_price_desc: Choose, which price to display for this vehicle. If Gross and Net Price is selected, but are not provided for this vehicle, the Standard Price will be displayed instead.
review_link_internal_link_desc: Target of the 'Review Link' internal link. The text of the link is maintained on the LSLR
legal_price_suffix_model_prices_desc: Define the legal suffix for the price to be shown in the Model Prices Component.
bbc_config_select_bodystyle_desc: Select this option, if the configuration should not be selectable in the Navigation Bodystyle Selection Component on the T10.
bodystyle_vi_hmc_custom_multimedia_desc: Check if you want to use a custom multimedia element instead of the large BBC Image.
start_position_desc: Start Position is defaulted to (0,0). Layer may be floated above component using negative X Y.
layer_image_desc: Drop image here to set the layer image for the animation.
fade_opacity_desc: Set the opacity percentage for the image at the start, mid, and stop of the animation.
fade_out_desc: The percentage of screen space the fade should take to complete it’s animation. “0” is default and disables the function.
fade_in_desc: The percentage of screen space the fade should take to complete it’s animation. “0” is default and disables the function.
loop_sequence_desc: Enabling looping will allow the sequence to continue from end to beginning until the set animation stop point is reached.
end_position_desc: Note that if no coordinate is provided, the image will stay static to the placement set in the start position.
full_width_desc: If checked, the Background image will be set to full width.
dam_reference_desc: Choose the folder that contains the sequence images in the DAM.
layer_type_desc: Choose the layer type for the animation. Image is a static image. Sequence is a series of images uploaded to the DAM.
video_endframe_caption_desc: Caption text to the teaser. Appears below the thumbnail image.
video_endframe_onclick_desc: Select either a video to play in the same frame as the current video. Size and aspect ratio will be inherited from the original settings. Video will play automatically onClick of CTA.
video_endframe_intro_desc: Introduction text to the teaser. Appears above the thumbnail image.
cnt_vi_c3_net_price_desc: Enter the net price here, if Gross and Net Price should be displayed.
cnt_vi_c3_series_desc: Select the series that should be displayed here.
cnt_vi_c3_baseballcardlink_desc: Please select a Baseballcard Bodystyle or Configuration here to include the vehicle information.
spacer_height_desc: *Required. Adjust the height of the component to fit the needs of the current layout.
cnt_spacer_c1_desc: This component adds vertical empty space between components.
mh_title_c1_show_grid_desc: If checked, a grid will appear on the image of the author view to assist with Hotspot Placement.

mh_title_c1_caption_align_desc: Defines the placement for all Image map hotspot captions.

hmc_filter_btn_max_value_desc: Please enter a number for the maximum value of the range.

colorizer_rgb_desc: You may use RGB (eg. FF0000) values for the selected color rather than a thumbnail in the color folder.
mh_autoplay_without_sound_desc: This will engage the Mute button on the Video player when playing.

mh_autoplay_sound: Play On Load With Sound Off(Muted)
include_price_list_desc: Select, if you want to include a download link for the Price List.
remove_icon_tooltip_desc: The tooltip will also be used in the Vehicle Comparison List.
exclude_category_expanders_desc: Select, if you don’t want to include an expander for each category of features.
back_link_desc: Please provide a label for the link
cnt_glossary_item_c1_include_in_detailvi: Select if title, text and utility links of the Glossary Item should also be displayed in the Detail View.
cnt_glossary_item_c1_popular_description: Select if the Glossary Item should be displayed in "Popular" in the Glossary Navigation.
cnt_glossary_item_c1_anchor_desc: Ensure that this anchor does not duplicate or conflict.
cnt_glossary_item_c1_include_in_detailvi: Include Glossary Item data in Detail View
cnt_glossary_item_c1_anchor_regex_messag: The entered anchor is not valid. Only ISO-8859-1 characters allowed and must begin with a letter ([A-Za-z]) and may be followed by any number of letters, digits ([0-9]), hyphens (-), underscores (_), colons (:), and periods (.).
fallback_teaser_scroller_with_fixed_colu: Fallback Teaser Scroller With Fixed Column
set_length_text: Set Length Value only (based on Animation Start)
animation_stop_desc: Choose the trigger point for where the animation should stop in the context of the component. Animation will always end as the component leaves the browser screen.
component_height_desc: If no background image exists, set a height for the component to allow for a top, midpoint, and bottom of component start and stop point. If set to 0 the start and stop point on the component will be the same regardless.
stop_size_desc: Set width x height for viewport stopping point. OPTIONAL: if no stop size selected, the start size will be the size of the viewport throughout the animation.
enable_viewport_desc: Enabling viewport places an additional div around the component that clips all elements (or parts of element) not within the viewport.
fallback_image_desc: The animation component will not work on touch tablet devices. Please provide a fallback image to be presented as static content for touch screens.
viewport_height_desc: Set Height of Viewport. (REQUIRED) If height of viewport is less than the height of the Full Width Image, the image will automatically pan from image top to image bottom as the user scrolls.
animation_start_desc: Choose the trigger point for where the animation should start in the context of the component. Animation will always begin as the component enters the browser screen.
comp_background_image_desc: Drop an image here to set the background for the component. This image will stretch to fit the width of the browser window.
start_size_desc: Set width x height for the viewport starting point. REQUIRED.
flash_fallback_image_desc: (Optional)Add a fallback image for the flash asset. This image will be used if the iFrame fallback is unavailable.
cnt_pc_ll_c1_field_description: Select the Product Catalog home page (all parts) to display a list of the first level child pages.
mh_scrooler_c1_indicator_label_desc: This label is displayed in front of the indicator.
mh_scrooler_c1_panel_indicator_desc: Thumbnail Panel Indicators are not available for colorizers and the Content Clipping Component.

mh_scrooler_c1_thumbnail_position_desc: If the default position is overlaying relevant scroller content, choose 'Below Scroller Content'.
mh_scrooler_c1_indicator_titles_text: Titles (only for Vehicle Info Trim Components)
mh_scrooler_c1_autoscroll_desc: If checked, the scroller images will rotate automatically on page load
mh_scrooler_c1_captiontext_desc: Enter a caption text for the image here.
mh_scrooler_c1_pauseplay_desc: If checked, the scroller will include pause/play buttons
expand_button_text_desc: Text to display on the expand button
collapse_button_text_desc: Text to display on the collapse button
mm_slidetext_c1_image_desc: This image can be used to overlay the main image to provide more complex titles.
mm_slidetext_c1_link_to_desc:
If enabled, the CTA will link to the video set in the mm_imagevideo_item_1 in the parent component.
This functionality is not available for YouTube videos.
truncated_text_size_desc: Number of characters to show when text is in collapsed mode
utl_lnk_lst_position_desc: Select to include a drag area for adding tools, e.g. links or buttons.
mm_slidetext_c1_color_title: Base Text Color and Font Size
mm_slidetext_c1_container_link_desc: Applies the link to the container surrounding the whole component. Note that any links applied inside of the text will be ignored if this option is checked.
pixels_desc: Use the arrows -OR- provide a number to move Container

testandtarget_config_mboxjs_desc: Upload a default mbox.js, which will be included in all pages including the global mbox. You can also upload custom mbox.js files on single pages to overwrite this default one.
darttagging_src_desc: Please enter the value of the "src" parameter.
mm_gal_item_2_download_desc: Add an image if you do not want to use the large image, such as one that includes a watermark.
webclipping_businessgadgetid_desc: Select the business gadget to be integrated.
share_config_toolbox_preferences_desc: Enter a comma separated list of maximum 4 services to be displayed next to the 'Share' button.
reference_symbols_desc: When "manual mode" is selcted, suffixes and references will be created using data entered in the baseball card "Legal price suffix" area. When "Automatic indexing" is selected, suffixes and references will be created automatically on the page for any data driven "vi" components. Indexes will be sequential from the starting selection.
nav_sitemap_vehicles_c1_config_link_desc: The default start is .../home/vehicles/viewall. For Buick the default start is .../home/vehicles.
t12b_list_view_icon_label_desc: Enter the alternative text for the list view icon of the View Switch on T12B.
externallink_desc: Can be used for folder or node redirects, fallback links or similar. For 301 redirects use the Redirect Template instead. External links can only be inserted from the External Link Library.   Exception: If an internal PDF resource is inserted from the DAM (such as via the Link functionality in the Rich Text Editor) this will be treated like a Direct External Link and open in a new window.
anchor_deeplink_desc: Provide a deep linking label to this item, for user friendly deep link or in-page link name.
webclipping_disable_redirects_desc: Disable redirect handling between CMS and clipped application. If NOT checked, redirects are handled between CMS and application. If checked, the redirect send by the application is passed to the clients browser by the CMS. Hte browser then handles the redirect.
iframe_positioning_layer_offset_adjustun: Use the arrows -OR- provide a number to move container up or down a layer.
webclipping_dump_traffic_desc: Enable this to dump all data that is received from the clipped application to the log-file. WARNING: Only for development and analysis purposes, do not activate this on production system!
trim_series_price_desc: Enter the price of the trim here (also used as fallback).
price_pos_label: Position of Price and Shopping Links
vehicledata_marketxmlfile_desc: Some markets cannot fetch the market.xml from a web-server, so the market.xml must be uploaded here.
bbc_thumbnail_bbc_large_size_desc: Enter the width and height of the thumbnail images used on the baseball cards in standard drop-down navigation.
bodystylecode_desc: The bodystyle code is data driven. It is used to retrieve information on Data Driven Pages.
cnt_compare_c1_advantages_desc: This text will override any text maintained in the LSLR
captiontext_desc: Enter a caption text for the image here.
layerBtnLink_desc: Select an alternative External Link from the External Link library.
price_table_config_bbc_desc: Please select a Bodystyle Baseball Card to enable price display.
separator_desc: Used to separate the range attribute ids
customMaxWidth_desc: Use the arrows -OR- provide a number to set the container maximum width in pixels. Please note that the minimum width overrides the maximum width if both are set and conflict.
search_internal_base_hostname_prod_desc: Specify the brand-unspecific base value of the internal (i.e. non-Akamai) PROD hostname, e.g. prod-www.gm.plusline.net. (this will only be used on PROD and can be either added or left blank on other systems).
open_graph_appid_panel_desc: The App ID is needed for Facebook sharing. By Default, the first listed App ID will be used. Authors may select a different App ID per page by accessing the 'social' tab in the page properties.
share_open_graph_desc_desc: Will be used by Facebook, for sharing by email and by Twitter, if no custom Tweet Text is provided.
mh1_utility_spinner_desc: Use the arrows -OR- provide a number to move image left or right
t12b_read_story_link_title_desc: Enter the linktitle for Read Story Link.
t03c_view_all_vehicles_with_filtering_de: T03c Help Me Choose (View All Vehicle with filtering)
cl_container_c1_dialog_endtime_desc: The component will be shown in the entered time slot. The time refers to the 24 hour clock (Time unit [hour]:[min]).
nav_tablay_item_desc: Please an image file to insert into the page.
share_config_description_text: The service names for the AddThis service list are available at http://www.addthis.com/services/list.
comparetrims_external_link_desc: Target of the 'Compare Trims' external link. The text of the link is maintained on the LSLR.
player_size_desc: If an aspect ratio has been choosen, the second value (height) will be ignored and internally computed from the width and the aspect ratio.
mm_c3_position_desc: Choose float to adjust the component position and to move it on top/behind other components.
inventory_config_c1_title_desc: The title will only appear in Search View
masthead_multimedia_expand_title_desc: This label is displayed when the expander is closed.
number_format_decimal_separator_desc: Enter the character used to separate decimals (eg. 1.00 or 1,00)
email_component_label_desc: The label will be included next to the icon when layout style 'Icon and Label' has been selected in the Share Configuration.
error_baseballcardlink: Please insert a valid Baseballcardreference in the page properties.
connect_twitter_desc: Set up the Twitter Users in Social Media Pages and Accounts.
page_layer_reference_internallink_desc: In order to specify the properties of the layer, set a link to the blank T17c Modal Layer Template on which the properties of the layer are defined.
btn_link_desc: Enter an alternative link title here. Link titles will be shown in a tooltip.
indicator_label: Indicator type for number of images
externallink_dataprivacy_description: The following selection will only apply if Cookie Privacy is enabled for this market (user has to consent to the use of cookies).
attr_config_checkbox_description: Select, if you want the unit to be linked to the disclaimer, if a disclaimer is maintained for the attribute.
t02_home_desc: The T02 Homepage includes a stage area and a teaser area below it. The teaser area can consist of a flash item or different teaser components.
rndtxt_fontcolor_desc: Color as hex (alpha, red, green, blue: e.g. C0FFA500 for orange with 75% opacity).
widebackground_c1_desc: Insert a page background image here by dragging the image from the Asset Manager into the drop-field. The image will be displayed instead of the framework background image.
mm_brightcove_video_player_desc: New brightcove video player that uses HTML5 for its video player
youtube_size_desc: Width and height are mandatory for the YouTube Videos.
nav_sitemap_vehicles_c2_sublevels_footer: Please select the number of sublevels to be included in the Sitemap Footer
darttagging_enable_desc: Select this, if DART tagging should be enabled for this market.
legal_price_suffix_vi5_desc: Define the legal suffix for the price to be shown on the T04c template (vi_5 teaser)
anchor_label_desc: This label will be displayed as an in-page/deep link anchor, and will anchor to the top of the content well.
feed_facebook_max_post_desc: Please select the default max. number of posts to be shwon on website.
tn_include_sub_navigation_label: Include Sub-Navigation in the Menu Link
vi1_bodylongdescription_desc: This is the body long description text used in the vi_1 component on T04a.
thumbnail_url_desc: Image used on the N2b template.
lightbox_image_richtext_desc: Enter Description Text for Lightbox image.
pricelist_excelfile_desc: Please upload the price list excel file here by double clicking the drop button and select the file on your hard drive.
share_inpagelink_desc: Select an anchor to which the shared link should lead.
webclipping_startpath_desc: Specify the path with which the business gadget will be initially requested.
cnt_storyref_c1_additional_categories_de: Additional categories may be added to further filter stories. A story must meet all categories to be included.
ts_vehicle_c1_desc: Double-click to edit the Quick links Title (ts_vehicle_c1)
share_mail_reply_to_email_adress_desc: Please provide an email adress to which the replies will be sent. Leave empty to use the email adress provided by the user.
t05a_core_generic_desc: This template allows to use various components and can therefore be used for various occasions. It is also used for Error Pages.
t12a_archive_label_desc: Enter a label for the archive area on T12A blog page (e.g. 'Archive')
spa_lnv_vin_promo3_desc: Promo badge image used for VINs not in a list within promotions.xml
spa_lnv_service_tab_desc: Pre-configured paths for the LNV service and component. These fields are just for reference and read-only
spa_lnv_vin_promo1_desc: Promo badge image used for VINs in the 'car' list within promotions.xml
spa_lnv_vin_promo3_disclaimer_label_desc: Promo disclosure used for VINs mapped to promo type of  Default
spa_lnv_vin_promo3_banner_desc: Promo banner image used for VINs not in a list within promotions.xml
spa_lnv_vin_promo1_banner_desc: Promo banner image used for VINs in the 'car' list within promotions.xml
spa_lnv_vin_promo2_disclaimer_label_desc: Promo disclosure used for VINs mapped to promo type of Truck
spa_lad_service_url_desc: Location of LAD client web service (can be a full URL or relative path)
spa_lnv_vin_promo2_desc: Promo badge image used for VINs in the 'truck' list within promotions.xml
spa_lnv_service_url_desc: Location of LNV client web service (can be a full URL or relative path)
spa_lnv_vin_promo2_banner_desc: Promo banner image used for VINs in the 'truck' list within promotions.xml
spa_lnv_assets_path_desc: Relative path to location of static LNV-related files
spa_lnv_vin_promo1_disclaimer_label_desc: Promo disclosure used for VINs mapped to promo type of Car
brochure_label: Request a Brochure - Required Meta Information
mm_hotspot_c1_chv_show_grid_desc: If checked, the overlain grid appear. Uncheck to hide it.
mm_hotspot_c1_chv_type_desc: Selecting Advanced will create a 'Use Common Hotspot' field below and a 'Hotspots' Tab
cnt_dealermap_c1_service_filter_desc: Make sure to select only one value under Dealer Service Codes Tag.
nav_item_image_group: Link Image Group to Main Image
mm_hotspot_c1_chv_text_behavior_desc: onClick will not work if there are links on the Hotspots, in which case OnHover will be selected
cnt_dealermap_c1_dealerinfo_label: Select the Dealer Information items to include in the map results. Label text can be overriden. To have no Label, simply delete the text that is inside the field below.
cnt_dealermap_c1_shoppingtools_label: Select the Shopping Tool items to include in the map results. Label text can be overriden.
nav_image_transition_desc: This adjusts the effect applied to the main image that is being controlled.
nav_item_slider_desc: Uncheck if you would like the slider to NOT render in the navigation container.
nav_item_mm3_connection_desc: When using this nav item to control an mm_3 component, a image(s) must be set to overlay on top of the main image in the mm_3 component.
cnt_offer_c1_bbcReference_desc: Reference a Baseball Card Bodystyle for any shopping links associated with this component.
cnt_dealermap_c1_searchbox_default_desc: This field will appear onFocus of the Zipcode text field
cnt_dealermap_c1_disclaimer_desc: The text will appear right aligned on the left side of the search box.
nav_item_alignment_desc: Alignment of the inserted navigation items.
enable_positioning_desc: If checked, the Positioning/floating tab will appear in this dialog
mm_hotspot_c1_chv_transition_behavior_de: The behavior will happen based on the text behavior of the caption above.
cnt_dealermap_c1_show_phone_text_desc: Dealer information will appear if the data is available
mm_hotspot_c1_chv_global_hotspot_desc: If all Hotspots require only one image set (with hover state), new fields will appear below
